name: Tiny Rogue (itch)
description:
Yet another Rogue clone based on Rogue 5.4

Note: There are some items that are not yet implemented include the amulet. I'll keep update the game after the game jam.

Controls

  • F1/? - Prints help
  • Arrow/Numpad/Vi keys - Move or melee attack
  • Space - Pick up, go up/down a level or rest
  • z - Rest for a turn
  • i - Inventory

Source Code: Github
